author: Conrad Duncan, Conrad Duncan
title: Coronavirus: Did Britain's 'patient zero' contract disease at an Austrian ski resort?
description: British family says they fell ill in January with symptoms that matched Covid-19
content:
A family from East Sussex has suggested they were Britains first coronavirus cases, arguing they caught the virus in January after a visit to an Austrian ski resort, which is now under investigation over an alleged unreported case.
Daren Bland, a 50-year-old… [+3238 chars]
